jabber.XMPPDebug

type
class
available in
neko, js, flash, php, node
Utility for debugging XMPP transfer. Set the haXe compiler flag: -D XMPP_DEBUG to activate it. Terminal targets: Color highlighted Browser targets: Printed to the default debug console Adobe air: Printed to fdb 'trace'

Static Variables

beautify : Bool

Indicates if the XMPP debug output should get formatted/beautified. If active, it is not ensured that the shown string matches the sent/recieved ones. Default value is false. Currently only supported in terminal targets.

color_inc : Int

platforms
neko, php, node

color_out : Int

platforms
neko, php, node

lastPrintWasOutgoing(default,null) : Bool

useConsole : Bool

platforms
js, flash
Indicates if the XMPP transfer should get printed to the browser console

Static Methods

__print(t : String, ?color : Int) : Void

platforms
neko, php, node

__print(t : String, ?out : Bool, ?level : String) : Void

platforms
js, flash

inline i(t : String) : Void

Print incoming XMPP data

inline o(t : String) : Void

Print outgoing XMPP data

inline print(t : String, out : Bool, ?level : String) : Void
